author: Nintendo of America
description:
Bye Sweet Carole is now available on Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/bye-sweet-carole-switch/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1021-01&utm_id=P1021-01   

Experience a haunting hand-drawn adventure as Bye Sweet Carole brings classic animation to life in this atmospheric narrative-horror game. 

Follow Lana Benton as she searches for her missing friend, Carole Simmons, across two haunting realms: the eerie Bunny Hall orphanage and the mysterious kingdom of Corolla. 

Solve intricate puzzles, sneak past deadly enemies, and transform into a rabbit to escape sinister threats. 

#ByeSweetCarole #NintendoSwitch 

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

title: Bye Sweet Carole – Launch Trailer – Nintendo Switch

author: Nintendo of America
description:
Absolum is out now on Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/absolum-switch/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1021-01&utm_id=P1021-01   

Meet the four playable heroes—Karl the sturdy dwarf, Galandra the balanced skirmisher, Cider the acrobatic rogue, and Brome the spell-slinging wizard—and see how each of them brings unique abilities and motivations to the battlefield. 
 
Explore dangerous lands, battle brutal bosses, unlock powerful upgrades and uncover the mystery of Azra’s rule over Talamh. 
 
Will you defy the Sun King and change the fate of this world? 

#Absolum #NintendoSwitch 

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s
